00010         {
00011                 print "<FIELDSET class='rfield'><LEGEND>Resource Selection:</LEGEND>" . LF;

00013

00015           "<INPUT type='radio' name='add_res_type' value='obs'";
00016                 if ($_POST["add_res_type"] == "obs") print " checked";
00017         print " id='sel_obs' onchange=\"document.main_form.submit()\">" .
00018           " <LABEL for='sel_obs'><B>Observatory</B></LABEL></TD>" . LF;
00019 
00020                 print "<TD align='center' width='45%'>" .
00021           "<INPUT type='radio' name='add_res_type' value='spa'";

00024           " <LABEL for='sel_spa'><B>Space Mission</B></LABEL></TD></TR>" . LF;
00025         print "</TABLE></FIELDSET>";
00026         
00027         if (!isSet($_POST["add_res_type"]))
00028                 print "<H3 align='center'>Please select a resource type</H3>" . LF;
00029                 
00030         print "<INPUT type='hidden' name='page' value='" . $page . "'>" . LF ;
00031         print "<INPUT type='hidden' name='action' value='" . $action . "'>" . LF ;
00032         }

00034         static function check($page, $action = NULL , $resource_type = NULL, $resource_id = NULL)
00035         {
00036                 $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00037         $userlevel = $_SESSION["user_level"];
00038 
00039         $link = new DbConnector();
00040 
00041         $query = "SELECT level FROM pages_list WHERE " .
00042              "name='" . $page . ".php" . "' LIMIT 1";
00043         $result = $link->query($query);
00044 
00045 
00046         if ((mysqli_num_rows($result) == FALSE) ||
00047                 (mysqli_num_rows($result) == 0))
00048         {
00049                 print "Page not found!" . LF;
00050                 //mysqli_close($link);
00051                 return(FALSE);
00052         }
00053 
00054         $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00055         $level = $row["level"];
00056         mysqli_free_result($result);
00057 
00058         if ($userlevel < $level)
00059         {
00060                 //mysqli_close($link);
00061                 if ($_SESSION["user_id"] == 1)
00062                 {
00063                         print "This page is only available for entitled users." . LF;
00064                         print "<P>If you have an account, please log in first before continuing." . LF;
00065                 }
00066                 else
00067                         print "Access to this page is not allowed for your user level!" . LF;

00075         //      mail_page($page);

00078                 case "add": 
00079                                 switch ($resource_type) {

00106                                         }
